marklogic.body: The reason Chris Jericho has never been "that guy" is because they make him "heel" or they do that lil "good guy" thing when hes back, then weeks later he turns heel on us again. Vince never really gives him a chance to be a tough baddass of a "babyface" champ. So people will Always hate him or not believe in him because we already know what he does. And just for the record..punk is not "the man" either and never will be. It takes alot to be "that man" Stone Cold being 1 of em, the rock, hogan, sting, ddp. ect. Not even cena is the man, but he will be 20yrs from now. just not anytime soon .
